body:
Dear eNewsletter subscriber 
 
 
 
 
 
 You are receiving 
this email as a EDN eNewsletter or magazine subscriber. 
 
Scroll to the bottom of this message to be removed from future EDN magazine 
subscription offers. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Exclusive 
Subscription Offer 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Dear eNewsletter subscriber, 
 
 
As a current eNewsletter subscriber, you 
understand that receiving current, up to date information regarding your 
well-being is vital. Today, I want to give you the exclusive opportunity to 
evaluate our special proposition, a $50 value, free of charge! 
   
 
 
   
 
 
Why men use our site? It is 
simple! 
   
 
 With our Super Pellets your male 
 desire abides. With our products you don't have to worry 
 about side effects or high prices. You won't suffer from 
 both of them. We ship to many countries and for each country 
 we have a different system of discounts (they All are good, 
 by the way!). Click and 
 find conditions for you! 
 
 
 Thank you for 
your time and we look forward to serving your information needs! 
   
 
Best regards, 
 
Audience Marketing Director 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This email was sent to hibody@csmining.org. 
 
Contact customer service by 
email.  EDN, Customer Service, 8878 Barrons Blvd, Highlands Ranch, CO 
80129-2345 USA.  
Remove me from future subscription email offers from EDN.  
Privacy Policy.
